greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A323505(A156552(n)).
comment: Sequence contains only terms of A001013 and each a(n) is a multiple of A112624(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 17 2019
